Root.Name: Project
Budabot
Root.Description: Budabot is a next-generation chatbot designed to give your org members they tools they need to be successful in Anarchy Online.

Pages.Page: Special thanks to:[br] -Derroylo (RK2), Sebuda (RK2), and Lucier (RK1) for creating the original Budabot.[br] -Mindrila (RK1) for his large contributions to version 1.0.[br] -Insanity-inc (RK2) for all the support and help they gave me when I first started developing Budabot modules and Capnsfix (RK2) for all of his ideas and suggestions.[br] -Dark Ninjas (RK2), Devil Inside (RK2) and Conquered Dreams (RK2) for letting me use their orgs to test new features.[br] -MajorOutage (RK1) for providing items db rips.[br] -CaptainZero (RK1) and Greasegirl (RK2) for hosting and moderating the budabot.com website.[br] -Mdkdoc420 (RK2) for coding, testing new features, and testing the AO Chat Proxy in a live environment.[br] -Docteeko (RK2) for helping manage the Budabot project, testing new features and suggesting needed finishing touches.[br] -Rosss (RK1) and Kinaton (RK1) for testing the release candidates, reporting bugs, and continuously giving great feedback.[br] -All the people who have contributed modules, ideas, and bug reports to help make Budabot the best bot AO has ever seen.[br]
